Package com.intellij.openapi.diff

Class DiffRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.diff.DiffRequestFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiffRequestFactoryImpl
    Deprecated. 
    use DiffRequestFactory instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class DiffRequestFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to initiate 3-way merge operations for multiple versions of content of a particular virtual file.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DiffRequestFactory getInstance()

      • createMergeRequest

        public abstract MergeRequest createMergeRequest(java.lang.String leftText,
                                                java.lang.String rightText,
                                                java.lang.String originalContent,
                                                VirtualFile file,
                                                Project project,
                                                ActionButtonPresentation okButtonPresentation,
                                                ActionButtonPresentation cancelButtonPresentation)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a request for a merge operation. To execute the request, obtain the diff tool instance by calling DiffManager.getDiffTool() and then call DiffTool.show(DiffRequest).
        Parameters:
        leftText - First of the changed versions of the content (to be displayed in the left pane).
        rightText - Second of the changed versions of the content (to be displayed in the right pane).
        originalContent - The version of the content before changes.
        file - The file which is being merged.
        project - The project in the context of which the operation is executed.
        okButtonPresentation - Parameter ignored.
        cancelButtonPresentation - Parameter ignored.
        Returns:
        The merge operation request.
